roleset.name: (cause to) have a bad color

example.name: one example should be enough
example.text: In one personal-injury case, a woman claimed she had been injured when she slipped in a pool, but the fall didn't explain why one of her arms was discolored [*][*-5] bluish [*T*-4] .

roleset.note: DISCOLOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'discolor' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from discolor.01-v predicate notes)
DISCOLORED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED. (from discolored.01-j)
